result.purpose: Defines data models related to blockchain events, notifications, and token management.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related data models into separate files for clarity and maintainability.

internal/domains/antenna/models/message..purpose: Defines data models for handling block full events in a blockchain context.

internal/domains/antenna/models/noti.go.purpose: Defines the NotificationPayload struct for handling notification data in the application.

internal/domains/antenna/models/token.go.purpose: Defines the RoninToken model with attributes for a cryptocurrency token.

internal/domains/antenna/models/transfer.purpose: Defines the TokenTransfer model for handling token transfer data in a blockchain context.
